channel.title: The Quest

item.title: The Quest
item.dc:creator: @Mutant138 Mutant138
item.description:
@Mutant138 wrote:

ok i need a bit of help with this i coded… it’s basically the end of a quest… and it says:
“if the player clicks on objectid:1993 with item:85 in his inventory then tele him to the coordinates of edgevill and send him a message saying quest complete! and reward the player with 500k and 300k wc experience”

case 1993: if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(85)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3087, 3493, 0); c.sendMessage("Alert##QUEST COMPLETE!##REWARD:##500k coins and 300k woodcutting experience"); } else { c.sendMessage("Alert##You need to find the shiny key first!##CLUE: what WOOD be the best way out?"); } break;

but i dont know how to give the player the woodcutting experience and the 500k coins… anyone out there that can give me the codes to edit this would be a massive help in hand!

Read full topic
